DataElement.preferredName: First Diarrhea Greater than or Equal to CTCAE Grade 3 Current Cycle Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date of first diarrhea assessed as greater than or equal to CTCAE Grade 3 in in the current treatment cycle.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First Diarrhea Greater Than or Equal To Severe Adverse Event Current Therapy Cycle
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._Watery bowel movements._The value should not be smaller than the given value and includes the given value, which is equivalent to "greater than or equal to"._An adverse event experience that requires intensive therapeutic intervention and interrupts usual daily activities._The name of the therapy that is currently being administered._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:Watery bowel movements.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

Property.preferredName: Greater Than or Equal To Severe Adverse Event Current Therapy Cycle
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:An adverse event experience that requires intensive therapeutic intervention and interrupts usual daily activities.:The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.:An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
An adverse event experience that requires intensive therapeutic intervention and interrupts usual daily activities.
The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.
An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for MHRI GU IRB# 2015-0547: HALT-D protocol, Bowel Movement Endpoint form. 6/6/17 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.
